most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services Fails to Open Due to WebSocket Error
common_issues.description: Users are unable to open Pieces Core Services due to a WebSocketException with a 404 error.  The connection to the local PiecesOS server fails.  This might indicate a problem with the PiecesOS installation or server process. Check if PiecesOS is running and restart the application or computer.  Verify network connectivity and ensure the correct port is being used.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:
Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Error: WebSocketException: Connection to 'http://127.0.0.1:39300/user/last_checked_in/stream#' was not upgraded to websocket, HTTP status code: 404

**Installation Details**

Succeeded: true
Path:

Current Version: Unknown

**Device Information**

Operating System: Windows
Current Version: "Windows 10 Home" 10.0 (Build 26100)
Min Version Supported: Windows 10 Build 1903
Additional Device Information: {cpu_list: [{"architecture":"x64","cores":8,"logicalProcessors":16,"l2Cache":{"value":4096,"units":"Bytes"},"l3Cache":{"value":16384,"units":"Bytes"},"description":"AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS with Radeon Graphics        "}], gpu_list: [{"type":"NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 Laptop GPU","unifiedMemoryArchitecture":null,"cores":null,"dedicatedVRam":{"value":6208618496,"units":"Bytes"}}, {"type":"AMD Radeon(TM) Graphics","unifiedMemoryArchitecture":null,"cores":null,"dedicatedVRam":{"value":2120007680,"units":"Bytes"}}, {"type":"Microsoft Basic Render Driver","unifiedMemoryArchitecture":null,"cores":null,"dedicatedVRam":{"value":0,"units":"Bytes"}}], npu_list: [], memory_info: {"totalRAM":{"value":16777216,"units":"KB"}}, display_list: [{"nativeHeight":1600,"nativeWidth":2560,"scaledHeight":1600,"scaledWidth":2560,"primary":true}]}
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the WebSocket error preventing users from opening Pieces Core Services.
Prioritize resolution of issue #776, "Unable to open Pieces Core Services," as it is the most frequent and active ticket.
Check PiecesOS installation, server process, network connectivity, and port configuration to resolve the WebSocket error.
Ensure the PiecesOS server is running and accessible on the correct port (39300).
Provide troubleshooting steps to users experiencing the WebSocket error, including restarting the application and computer.
Consider updating support documentation with solutions for the "Unable to open Pieces Core Services" issue.
